full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MI SKAR MI CHEN GYI BSANGS BSAM PA KUN 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES MI SKAR MI CHEN LNGA PO BSANGS MCHOD BZA' BTUNG 'BRU SNA SOGS MDOR BSDUS PHAN YON LA BSAM GYI MI KHYAB PAS BSAM @005A *, ,PA KUN 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MI SKAR MI SKAR MI CHEN LNGA PO BSANGS PHUL BA LA SNA TSOGS GANG BSAM LAS LA MYUR 'GRUB YIN, ,'DI NI SNGON KHA DZA: MANG NGAG YIN, ,SKAR MI THAMS CAD DBANG DU BSDUS PA MA, MI NAD PHYUGS NAD GOD LA NAD RIMS DAL YAMS BAR CHAD SEL, 'THAB RTZOD 'KHRUGS LONG MI KHA KAH MCHU BRAM MCHU SOGS GZHAN GYIS MI THUB LA 'GAL RKYEN SEL ZHING MTHUN RKYEN 'GRUB, ,TSE BSOD DPAL 'BYOR SNYAN GRAGS LONGS SPYOD SPEL, ,THE TSOM MING CANG NGES PAR ZAB, CES PA 'DI NI CHA HAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MAN NGAG BZHIN DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
